徒人: (かちど) - walker; person going by foot
徒侍: (かちざむらい) - humble samurai who served as a body guard on foot
徒労: (とろう) - fruitless effort; wasted effort; abortive scheme; futility
徒労に終わる: (とろうにおわる) - to end in vain; to be wasted effort
徒士: (かち) - foot soldier (Edo period)/samurai on foot; (徒, 徒歩, 歩, 歩行 only)   going on foot/walking
徒士組: (かちぐみ) - bodyguards in service of the shogun who would walk ahead of him on an outing(Edo period)
徒士衆: (かちしゅう) - humble samurai who served as a body guard on foot; bodyguards in service of the shogun who would walk ahead of him on an outing(Edo period)
徒弟制度: (とていせいど) - an apprentice system; apprenticeship
徒心: (あだごころ) - cheating heart; fleeting heart; fickle heart
徒手: (としゅ) - being empty-handed/bare hand (e.g. fight); being penniless
徒手体操: (としゅたいそう) - free-standing exercises; calisthentics (performed without using any apparatus)
徒手空拳: (としゅくうけん) - (yoji) empty-handed; with nothing to start with; without capital
徒書き: (いたずらがき) - scribbling; doodling; graffiti
徒桜: (あだざくら) - ephemeral (easily scattered) cherry blossom; fickle woman
徒然なるままに: (つれづれなるままに) - at a loose end; having nothing to do
徒疎か: (あだおろそか) - making light of; disregarding
徒組: (かちぐみ) - bodyguards in service of the shogun who would walk ahead of him on an outing(Edo period)
徒罪: (とざい) - imprisonment (for one to three years)
徒者: (ただもの) - ordinary person (usu. in neg. sentences)
徒花: (むだばな) - blossom which fails to produce fruit; non-fruit-bearing flower
徒言歌: (ただことうた) - plain form (of waka)
従い: (したがい) - in accordance with; subordinate to
従う: (したがう) - to abide (by the rules); to obey; to follow; to accompany
従える: (したがえる) - to be accompanied by; to subdue
従たる: (じゅうたる) - subordinate; secondary; junior; incidental; accessory
従三位: (じゅさんみ) - second grade of the third rank of honor (honour)
従事: (じゅうじ) - engaging; pursuing; following (e.g. profession or occupation)
従事者: (じゅうじしゃ) - someone engaged in a certain pursuit; practitioner; worker; employee
従位接続詞: (じゅういせつぞくし) - subordinating conjunction
従価税: (じゅうかぜい) - ad valorem duty
従兄弟半: (いとこはん) - first cousin once removed
従兄弟煮: (いとこに) - vegetables boiled in miso
従兄弟違い: (いとこちがい) - parent's cousin; first-cousin once removed
従容自若: (しょうようじじゃく) - (yoji) having presence of mind; imperturbable; calm and self-possessed; with serenity
従属コンパイル: (じゅうぞくコンパイル) - dependent compilation; separate compilation
従属リスト: (じゅうぞくリスト) - dependence list
従属変数: (じゅうぞくへんすう) - dependent variable
従属局: (じゅうぞくきょく) - tributary station
従来: (juurai) - até agora, até o momento; tradicional, convencional, usual, existente
従来型銅線: (じゅうらいがたどうせん) - existing copper line
従来技術: (じゅうらいぎじゅつ) - existing technology; conventional technology; prior art
従来農法: (じゅうらいのうほう) - traditional farming
従業員: (じゅうぎょういん) - employee; worker
従業者: (じゅうぎょうしゃ) - worker; employee; person being employed
従者: (じゅうしゃ) - follower; attendant; valet; servant
従軍慰安婦: (じゅうぐんいあんふ) - (euphemism) women working in military brothels (esp. those forced into prostitution as a form of sexual slavery by the Japanese military during WWII); (campaign) comfort women
従軍記者: (じゅうぐんきしゃ) - war correspondent
従量: (じゅうりょう) - incurred amount; usage volume; metered rate or amount
従量制: (じゅうりょうせい) - measured rate system; cost charged by quantity; pay-as-you-go; pay-for-use
従量税: (じゅうりょうぜい) - (taxation) a specific duty
従順: (じゅうじゅん) - obedient; gentle; meek; submissive; docile
得: (toku/e/u) - acquire , profit, advantage, benefit, gain; rebirth in paradise, entering nirvana
得する: (とくする) - to make a profit
